Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Hotel, Great Amenities and Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: p3rkolater
Reviews.Content: stayed san francisco week presidents day weekend 2010 greeting extremely friendly efficient booked month advance hotels website checkinout staff concierges job hotel located 40 feet cable car line combined muni buses getting city 3 day pass 20 union square located close unfortunately event tent set time larger expected plenty spouse move feeling hotel excellent staff extremely efficient helpful requests helped restaurant reservations nearly day set gray line tour wine country included amenities breakfast winecheese outstanding absolutely amazed included rate cant positive hotel san francisco definitely stay
